:::Godfather:::

::He grabs him and bangs him against the wall::
Godfather: You may not love me, but YOU WILL RESPECT ME!
::He shakes his head::
Godfather: Eh, whatever.  Do whatever you want.

--part1_dc.8b68e79.287af838_boundary
